title: chainganginc
author: chainganginc
content: check it out its still being developed you cant log in yet but next week it may be ready.www.weconnectd.com

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: We have forums like Bitcointalk, beermoney forums, crypto twitter and Reddit. What are those forums lacking that makes you think your crypto networking site can do better, or is it another one of the so many forums that will just die a natural death after a year or so because people aren't seeing anything new they have to offer?

comments.author: abnormies
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 06, 2022, 09:59:13 PMWe have forums like Bitcointalk, beermoney forums, crypto twitter and Reddit. What are those forums lacking that makes you think your crypto networking site can do better, or is it another one of the so many forums that will just die a natural death after a year or so because people aren't seeing anything new they have to offer?I am not the OPbut I COULDN'T BELIEVE the way you're talking like if you were jesus looool. I didn't see such a one before, my advice, please visit a psychological.I don't mean this is okay: https://i.ibb.co/sysBQPJ/Untitled.png

comments.author: chainganginc
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 06, 2022, 09:59:13 PMWe have forums like Bitcointalk, beermoney forums, crypto twitter and Reddit. What are those forums lacking that makes you think your crypto networking site can do better, or is it another one of the so many forums that will just die a natural death after a year or so because people aren't seeing anything new they have to offer?This is more like a college investment instead you should not be in debt after 4 years or more.  Going to push people to get a clearer understanding of crypto. What are the use cases of the coins/tokens. This will help investors choose better coins. It will also help any coin/token communities grow.  Looking to actually bring the blockchain to the streets with a company. Like a Coinconnect Laundromat  would be good. All these coinless ones should adopt crypto. They waste nickles and dimes that could be a crypto wallet instead of a disposable card.
